displayName.japanese: コースを再初期化する

description.english: Earn the power to interact with respawning totems
description.french: Obtenez le pouvoir d'intéragir avec les totems de réinitialisation.
description.german: Verschaffe dir die Möglichkeit, mit zurückgesetzten Totems zu interagieren.
description.spanish: Consigue el poder de interactuar con los tótems de reaparición
description.italian: Ottieni il potere di interagire con i totem della rigenerazione.
description.russian: Получите способность взаимодействовать с возрождающимися тотемами
description.tchinese: 获得与重生图腾互动的力量
description.japanese: リスポーントーテムを操作するパワーを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Ganhe o poder de interagir com totens reaparecendo
description.polish: Zdobądź moc działania na totemach odnowy
description.turkish: Tekrar canlanan totemlerle etkileşime girme gücünü elde et

description.english: Earn the power to interact with strength totems
description.french: Obtenez le pouvoir d'interagir avec les totems de force.
description.german: Verschaffe dir die Möglichkeit, mit Krafttotems zu interagieren.
description.spanish: Consigue el poder de interactuar con los tótems de fuerza
description.italian: Ottieni il potere di interagire con i totem della forza.
description.russian: Получите способность взаимодействовать с тотемами силы
description.tchinese: 获得与力量图腾互动的力量
description.japanese: 体力のトーテムを操作するパワーを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Ganhe o poder de interagir com totens de força
description.polish: Zdobądź moc działania na totemach siły
description.turkish: Güç totemleriyle etkileşime girme gücünü elde et

description.english: Open the doors to the Temple of the Bird
description.french: Ouvrez les portes du temple de l'oiseau.
description.german: Öffne die Türen zum Tempel des Vogels
description.spanish: Abre las puertas del Templo del pájaro
description.italian: Apri le porte del tempio del falco.
description.tchinese: 打开鸟神庙的门
description.japanese: 鳥の寺への扉を開く
description.brazilian: Abra as portas do Templo do Pássaro

description.english: Pray before the scarletine fish
description.french: Receuillez-vous devant le poisson d'écarlatine.
description.german: Bete vor dem Scharlachfisch
description.spanish: Reza ante el pez escarlata
description.italian: Prega davanti al pesce di scarlattite.
description.tchinese: 在斯卡利汀鱼面前祈祷
description.japanese: 緋色の魚の前で祈りを捧げる
description.brazilian: Reze perante o peixe escarlate

description.english: Pray before the scarletine dog
description.french: Receuillez-vous devant le chien d'écarlatine.
description.german: Bete vor dem Scharlachhund
description.spanish: Reza ante el perro escarlata
description.italian: Prega davanti al cane di scarlattite.
description.tchinese: 在斯卡利汀狗面前祈祷
description.japanese: 緋色の犬の前で祈りを捧げる
description.brazilian: Reze perante o cão escarlate

description.english: Pray before the scarletine monkey
description.french: Receuillez-vous devant le singe d'écarlatine.
description.german: Bete vor dem Scharlachaffen
description.spanish: Reza ante el mono escarlata
description.italian: Prega davanti alla scimmia di scarlattite.
description.tchinese: 在斯卡利汀猴面前祈祷
description.japanese: 緋色の猿の前で祈りを捧げる
description.brazilian: Reze perante o macaco escarlate

description.english: Pray before the scarletine bird
description.french: Receuillez-vous devant l'oiseau d'écarlatine.
description.german: Bete vor dem Scharlachvogel
description.spanish: Reza ante el pájaro escarlata
description.italian: Prega davanti al falco di scarlattite.
description.tchinese: 在斯卡利汀鸟面前祈祷
description.japanese: 緋色の鳥の前で祈りを捧げる
description.brazilian: Reze perante o pássaro escarlate

displayName.japanese: ファンタスティック・フォー

description.english: Pray in all the temples
description.french: Receuillez-vous dans tous les temples.
description.german: Bete in allen Tempeln
description.spanish: Reza en todos los templos
description.italian: Prega in tutti i templi.
description.tchinese: 在所有寺庙祈祷
description.japanese: すべての寺で祈りを捧げよう
description.brazilian: Reze em todos os templos

description.english: Get the 15 objects from the first temple
description.french: Obtenez les 15 rouages du premier temple.
description.german: Hol die 15 Objekte aus dem ersten Tempel
description.spanish: Consigue los 15 objetos del primer templo
description.italian: Prendi i 15 oggetti del primo tempio.
description.tchinese: 从第一座神庙获得15件物品
description.japanese: 最初の寺で15個のオブジェクトを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Consiga os 15 objetos do primeiro templo

displayName.german: Das Studium war einfacher als das hier!
displayName.russian: В старших классах и то было легче!
displayName.japanese: 大学のほうが楽だったな！
displayName.brazilian: Fazer faculdade foi mais fácil do que isso!

description.english: Get the 9 objects from the Temple of the Dog
description.french: Obtenez les 9 rouages du temple du chien.
description.german: Hol die 9 Objekte aus dem Tempel des Hundes
description.spanish: Consigue los 9 objetos del Templo del perro
description.italian: Prendi i 9 oggetti del tempio del cane.
description.tchinese: 从狗庙获得9件物品
description.japanese: 犬の寺で9個のオブジェクトを手に手に入れる
description.brazilian: Consiga os 9 objetos do Templo do Cão

description.english: Get the 14 objects from the Temple of the Monkey
description.french: Obtenez les 14 rouages du temple du singe.
description.german: Hol die 14 Objekte aus dem Tempel des Affen
description.spanish: Consigue los 14 objetos del Templo del mono
description.italian: Prendi i 14 oggetti del tempio della scimmia.
description.tchinese: 从猴庙获得14件物品
description.japanese: サルの寺院で14個のオブジェクトを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Consiga os 14 objetos do Templo do Macaco

displayName.english: I have a subject for my thesis!
displayName.german: Ich habe ein Thema für meine Masterarbeit!
displayName.italian: Finalmente un argomento per la mia tesi!
displayName.russian: У меня есть тема для диссертации!
displayName.japanese: 卒論のテーマは決まりだな！
displayName.brazilian: Eu tenho um tema para minha tese!

description.english: Get the 12 objects from the Temple of the Bird
description.french: Obtenez les 12 rouages du temple de l'oiseau.
description.german: Hol die 12 Objekte aus dem Tempel des Vogels
description.spanish: Consigue los 12 objetos del Templo del pájaro
description.italian: Prendi i 12 oggetti del tempio del falco.
description.tchinese: 从鸟庙获得12件物品
description.japanese: トリの寺院で12個のオブジェクトを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Consiga os 12 objetos do Templo do Pássaro

description.english: Find a relic. Do you want to become an archeologist, yes or no?
description.french: Trouvez une relique. Vous voulez devenir archéologue, oui ou non ?
description.german: Finde eine Reliquie. Willst du Archäologe werden, ja oder nein?
description.spanish: Encuentra una reliquia. ¿Quieres ser un arqueólogo? Vamos, ¿sí o no?
description.italian: Trova una reliquia. Vuoi o non vuoi diventare un archeologo?
description.russian: Найдите реликвию. Вы хотите стать археологом или нет?
description.tchinese: 找到遗物。你想成为考古学家，是不是？
description.japanese: 遺物を1個見つける。考古学者になりたいのか？
description.koreana: 유물을 찾게. 자네 고고학자가 되고 싶은 건 맞지, 아닌가?
description.brazilian: Encontre uma relíquia. Você quer se tornar um arqueologista, sim ou não?
description.polish: Znajdź relikt. Chcesz zostać archeologiem, tak czy nie?
description.turkish: Bir kalıntı bul. Arkeolog olmak istiyor musun, evet veya hayır?

description.english: Find all the relics. Who knows, maybe it'll be Dr. PAF soon.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les reliques. Bientôt Dr.PAF, qui sait ?
description.german: Finde alle Reliquien. Wer weiß, vielleicht wird es bald Dr. PAF sein.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las reliquias. Quién sabe, quizás te tendrán que llamar Dr. PAF.
description.italian: Trova tutte le reliquie. Chi lo sa, magari a breve sarai conosciuto come prof. POW.
description.russian: Найдите все реликвии. Кто знает, возможно, станете Профессором Бахом.
description.tchinese: 找到所有遗物。谁知道呢，也许很快就会是PAF医生了。
description.japanese: 遺物をすべて見つける。もうすぐパフ博士になれるかも。
description.koreana: 유물을 모두 찾게. 누가 알아, 자네가 곧 PAF 박사가 될지.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as relíquias. Quem sabe, talvez seja o Dr. PAF muito em breve.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie relikty. Kto wie, może już niedługo będę Doktorem PAF.
description.turkish: Tüm kalıntıları bul. Kim bilir, belki yakın zamanda adım Dr. BAM olur.

description.english: Do some patient and meticulous archeological work
description.french: Faire un travail d'archéologue patient et minutieux.
description.german: Leiste etwas geduldige und akribische archäologische Arbeit
description.spanish: Realiza un trabajo arqueológico paciente y meticuloso
description.italian: Fai un lavoro da archeologo meticoloso e paziente.
description.russian: Выполните часть неторопливой и скрупулезной археологической работы
description.tchinese: 做一些耐心细致的考古工作
description.japanese: 根気よくかつ丁寧に考古学の作業を進めよう
description.koreana: 인내심을 가지고 꼼꼼하게 고고학 작업을 합시다.
description.brazilian: Faça algum trabalho de arqueologia paciente e meticuloso
description.polish: Wykonaj cierpliwą i dokładną pracę archeologiczną
description.turkish: Sabırlı ve titiz bir arkeolojik çalışma yap

displayName.english: It's a bit like finding a problematic.
displayName.french: Un peu comme trouver une problématique.
displayName.german: Es ist ein bisschen so, als fände man ein Problem.
displayName.italian: Un po' come trovare un problema
displayName.tchinese: 这有点像发现一个问题。
displayName.japanese: 問題点を見つけるようなものだな。
displayName.brazilian: É um pouco como encontrar um problemático.

description.english: Solve the labyrinth riddle in the Temple of the Monkey
description.french: Réussir l'énigme du labyrinthe dans le temple du singe.
description.german: Löse das Labyrinth-Rätsel im Tempel des Affen
description.spanish: Resuelve el acertijo del laberinto en el Tempo del mono
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma del labirinto nel tempio della scimmia.
description.russian: Решите загадку с лабиринтом в Храме Обезьяны
description.tchinese: 解开猴庙迷宫之谜
description.japanese: 猿の寺で迷宮の謎を解く
description.brazilian: Solucione o enigma do labirinto no Templo do Macado
description.polish: Rozwiąż zagadkę labiryntu w Świątyni Małpy

displayName.english: Not as tedious as a bibliography!
displayName.german: Nicht so langweilig wie eine Bibliographie!
displayName.tchinese: 不像参考书目那么乏味！
displayName.japanese: 書誌学ほど、退屈じゃないな！
displayName.brazilian: Não é tão entediante como a bibliografia!
displayName.turkish: Bir bibliyografya kadar da sıkıcı ve uğraştırıcı olmasın!

description.english: Destroy the 3 scarletine blocks in the Temple of the Monkey in a single time limit.
description.french: Détruire les 3 blocs d'écarlatine du temple du singe dans une même temporalité.
description.german: Zerstöre die 3 scharlachroten Blöcke im Tempel des Affen in einem einzigen Zeitlimit.
description.spanish: Destruye 3 bloques escarlata en el Templo del mono dentro del tiempo límite.
description.italian: Distruggi tre blocchi di scarlattite nel tempio della scimmia in uno stesso lasso di tempo.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 3 алых блока в Храме Обезьяны за один промежуток времени.
description.tchinese: 在一个时间限制内摧毁猴庙的3个斯卡利汀立方体。
description.japanese: 猿の寺で緋色のブロックを3個、1回の制限時間内で破壊しよう。
description.koreana: 원숭이의 사원에서 시간 제한 내에 주홍석 블록 3개를 부수세요.
description.brazilian: Destrua os 3 blocos escarlate no Templo do Macaco em um só limite de tempo.
description.polish: Zniszcz 3 szkarłatne bloki w Świątyni Małpy w jednym podejściu.
description.turkish: Tek seferde Maymun Tapınağı'ndaki 3 kızıl taş bloğunu yok et.

displayName.spanish: La arqueología nunca había sido tan lucrativa.
displayName.tchinese: 那是一些有利可图的考古。
displayName.japanese: 考古学は儲かるもんだな。

description.english: Take everything you can carry. Is this really archaeology?
description.french: Emportez tout ce qui est emportable. Est-ce vraiment ça l'archéologie ?
description.german: Nimm alles mit, was du tragen kannst. Ist das wirklich Archäologie?
description.spanish: Coge todo lo que puedas. ¿Esto cuenta como arqueología?
description.italian: Arraffa tutto quel che puoi. Non rispecchia l'essenza dell'archeologia, ma va bene così.
description.russian: Надо брать все, что можно унести. А это действительно археология?
description.tchinese: 带上能带的所有物品。这真的是考古学吗？
description.japanese: 運べるものはすべて持って行こう。これは本当に考古学なのか？
description.koreana: 가지고 갈 수 있는 건 다 챙기세요. 이게 정말 고고학이 맞나요?
description.brazilian: Leve tudo que você possa carregar. Isso é mesmo arqueologia?
description.polish: Podnieś wszystko, co możesz unieść. Czy to też archeologia?
description.turkish: Taşıyabileceğin her şeyi al. Arkeoloji gerçekten bu mu?

displayName.english: One last fist bump for the road.
displayName.french: Un dernier coup de poing pour la route.
displayName.german: Ein letzter Fausthieb für die Reise.
displayName.spanish: Un último bache en el camino.
displayName.japanese: 進む前に、最後のグータッチをしておこう。
displayName.brazilian: Um último primeiro solavanco para a estrada.
displayName.turkish: Yola çıkmadan son defa çak bir beşlik.

description.english: Now get out of this temple!
description.french: Sortez de ce temple, à la fin !
description.german: Und jetzt raus aus diesem Tempel!
description.spanish: ¡Sal pitando del templo!
description.italian: E alla fine esci dal tempio!
description.russian: А теперь прочь из этого храма!
description.tchinese: 现在离开这座庙宇！
description.japanese: さあ、寺から脱出しよう！
description.brazilian: Agora, saia desse templo!

displayName.japanese: 隠された目標を達成/ハッカー学者

description.english: Hidden success / You are a meta archaeologist.
description.french: Succès caché / Vous êtes un archéologue méta.
description.german: Versteckter Erfolg / Du bist ein Meta-Archäologe.
description.spanish: Logro oculto / Eres un meta arqueólogo.
description.italian: Successo nascosto: ora sei un meta-archeologo.
description.tchinese: 隐藏的成功/你是一个元考古学家。
description.japanese: 隠された目標を達成/君はメタ考古学者だ。
description.brazilian: Sucesso oculto / Você é um meta arqueologista.
description.turkish: Gizli başarı / Bir arkeologdan daha fazlasısın.
